alert.note: Alert for Caddo; Comanche; Kiowa (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 18 at 12:26AM CDT until June 18 at 1:15AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Comanche County in southwestern Oklahoma... Southwestern Caddo County in southwestern Oklahoma... East central Kiowa County in southwestern Oklahoma... * Until 115 AM CDT. * At 1226 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Roosevelt, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Roosevelt, Cooperton, Meers, Boone, Lake Lawtonka, Tom Steed Reservoir, and northwestern Wichita Mountains Wildlife Refuge. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
